entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prévost
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
